dict.acceptation: 固体的；实心的；结实的，可靠的；可信赖的；

sent.orig: The nearby Solid shoe factory churns out goods for export, as well as the domestic market.
sent.trans: 而附近的Solid制鞋厂也辛苦地制造出一些用来出口与内销的商品。

sent.orig: Solid steel chrome case and closed band, screw case back, hidden butterfly clasp with Gc logo.
sent.trans: Solid钢铬案件和封闭带，螺丝盒背面，隐藏的蝴蝶扣有限保修与GC标志。

sent.orig: Our products are: large solid wood beds, solid wood bunk beds, and solid wood bed cluster.
sent.trans: 所生产的产品有实木大床、实木双层床、实木子母床等。

sent.orig: LCA is a useful tool to improve municipal solid waste management and reduce municipal solid waste.
sent.trans: 生命周期评价框架的建立有助于改进城市垃圾管理，是减少城市垃圾产生的有用工具。

sent.orig: Devitrification. The process in which a glass (noncrystalline or vitreous solid) transforms to a crystalline solid.
sent.trans: 玻璃（非晶的或玻璃质固体）转变为晶体的一种工艺。
